assessments.status_rationale: ISM’s October 2025 Manufacturing PMI has not been released yet (due by 2025-11-01), and today’s news contains no PMI figures.
No reporting of the Euro area HCOB Services PMI (final) for October; the final print is due 2025-11-06.
China’s October 2025 Industrial Production YoY is not in the provided news and is scheduled for mid-November.
The October 2025 U.S. unemployment rate is not reported here; BLS release is due 2025-11-08.
No evidence the Nikkei 225 has reached 42,000; a headline notes Asia markets fell but provides no level confirming/denying the threshold.
No FX rates cited for USD/CNH; threshold could still be met by the 2025-11-30 deadline.
No WTI settlement prices are mentioned; outcome before the 2025-11-30 deadline remains unresolved.
No LME copper settlement levels are included in the news; the threshold could still be met by deadline.
No VIX closing level is provided; with the deadline on 2025-11-30, status remains open.
No ETH price data appears in the news; barrier event may still occur before 2025-11-30.
No reporting of a new NASA Artemis HLS competition solicitation on SAM.gov; deadline remains 2025-11-30.
No mention of Lynas Rare Earths share price; threshold could still be met before 2025-11-30.
